game.name: Life After End
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 대규모 멀티플레이어, 시뮬레이션, 무료 플레이
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Dive into the harsh world of post-apocalyptic Siberia. Extreme climate, limited resources, wild animals, and other players - all this is part of the daily struggle, where only the strongest survive. Are you ready to find out what life is like after the end?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dive into the harsh world of post-apocalyptic Siberia. Extreme climate, limited resources, wild animals, and other players - all this is part of the daily struggle, where only the strongest survive. Are you ready to find out what life is like after the end?
